cms.query.QueryText: DELETE FROM CMS_ObjectVersionHistory WHERE VersionModifiedWhen < (SELECT MIN(VersionModifiedWhen) FROM (SELECT ##TOPN## VersionModifiedWhen FROM CMS_ObjectVersionHistory WHERE VersionObjectType LIKE @ObjectType AND VersionObjectID = @ObjectID AND VersionNumber NOT LIKE N'%.0' ORDER BY VersionModifiedWhen DESC) sub) AND VersionObjectType LIKE @ObjectType AND VersionObjectID = @ObjectID AND VersionNumber NOT LIKE N'%.0'
